School enchantment (compulsion) [mind-affecting]; Level bard 5, psychic 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, spiritualist 6, summoner 5, unchained Summoner 6, witch 6; Subdomain Competition 6, Heroism 6; Bloodline Martyred 6;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range touch
Targets creature touched
Duration 1 min./level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless);  Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{Heroism}, except the creature gains a +4 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks, immunity to fear effects, and temporary hit points equal to your caster level (maximum 20).
